content: Yellow calls for an immediate ceasefire and opening of formal peace negotiations between your nation and Purple to resolve this conflict through diplomacy.
Yellow calls for an immediate ceasefire and is willing to facilitate formal peace negotiations between your nation and Orange to resolve this conflict through diplomacy.
Yellow seeks to coordinate a diplomatic response with White and Blue to de-escalate the conflict between Orange and Purple and promote a peaceful resolution.
Yellow calls on all nations to exercise restraint and pursue non-violent dialogue and diplomacy to resolve ongoing conflicts in accordance with international law.

Yellow reaffirms support for your sovereignty and territorial integrity. We stand ready to facilitate confidential negotiations between your nation and Orange aimed at an immediate ceasefire and diplomatic resolution respecting UN principles.
Yellow calls for an immediate ceasefire and opening of formal peace negotiations between your nation and Purple to resolve this conflict through diplomacy and in accordance with international law.
Yellow calls on all nations to exercise restraint and pursue peaceful diplomatic solutions respecting sovereignty and human rights.
Yellow urges Orange to declare an immediate ceasefire and open formal peace talks. Continued violence will only lead to greater instability and human suffering.
Yellow affirms support for Purple's sovereignty and territorial integrity. We stand ready to facilitate confidential negotiations between your nations to establish a sustainable peace.

Yellow reiterates its call for an immediate ceasefire and opening of diplomatic negotiations between all parties. Violence and hostility will only breed more conflict unless we choose the path of empathy, compassion, and mutual understanding.

Yellow affirms support for your sovereignty and remains ready to facilitate confidential talks with Orange aimed at a sustainable peace. However, both sides must demonstrate openness to negotiate respectfully and in good faith as called for by international law.

Yellow calls on Orange to declare an immediate ceasefire and reciprocate Purple's stated openness to negotiations without preconditions. Further conflict will only damage our nations and peoples. Dialogue is the only path towards a just and lasting resolution.

Yellow reiterates its call for an immediate ceasefire between Orange and Purple, followed by inclusive multilateral peace negotiations without preconditions. Continued conflict will only breed further human suffering and instability. All nations are urged to support diplomacy as the only ethical path towards a just and sustainable peace.

Yellow affirms support for your sovereignty and territorial integrity. We urge openness to diplomacy and urge refraining from actions that may undermine progress towards peace. Yellow remains ready to facilitate confidential discussions as a neutral party whenever you and Orange are willing.

Yellow calls on Orange to reciprocate the diplomatic calls of other nations by declaring an immediate ceasefire and agreeing to inclusive multilateral negotiations without preconditions. Continued hostilities will not achieve any nation's objectives and will only lead to greater losses. A peaceful resolution respecting all parties is the only ethical path forward.

Yellow calls on all nations to continue exercising restraint and pursuing diplomacy in a spirit of open-mindedness, empathy, and mutual understanding. Violence will solve nothing - together through respectful dialogue we can find equitable solutions respecting everyone's security and human rights.

Yellow reaffirms support for your sovereignty and territorial integrity. We encourage openness to diplomacy and avoiding any actions that could undermine progress towards peace. Yellow remains ready as a neutral party to facilitate confidential discussions whenever you and Orange are willing.

Yellow calls on Orange to reciprocate diplomatic efforts through restraint and good faith participation in multilateral negotiations without preconditions. Continued conflict will achieve no one's objectives. A just and sustainable peace is only possible through respectful dialogue and mutual understanding between all sides.

Yellow calls on all nations to continue exercising restraint and pursuing non-violent conflict resolution through respectful diplomacy and multilateral negotiations. Violence will solve nothing - together through empathy and mutual understanding, we can find equitable solutions respecting sovereignty, security and human rights for all.

Yellow reaffirms support for your sovereignty and remains willing to confidentially facilitate discussions between your nation and Orange aimed at building trust and paving the way for inclusive multilateral negotiations.

Yellow urges restraint and renewed openness to diplomacy. We must choose the path of empathy, good faith and mutual understanding over escalation if peace is to be achieved respecting everyone's rights and security concerns.

Yellow commends all nations advocating diplomacy and conflict resolution through respectful dialogue. A just and sustainable peace is within reach if we maintain restraint and renew commitments to non-violence, mutual understanding, and inclusive multilateral negotiations without preconditions. Yellow stands ready to confidentially facilitate initial direct talks between key parties whenever they feel conditions permit.

Yellow commends diplomatic steps taken and calls on all nations to maintain restraint and openness to inclusive multilateral talks. A peaceful resolution upholding sovereignty and justice for all is within reach if we continue prioritizing empathy, mutual understanding and non-violent conflict resolution through respectful dialogue without preconditions.

Yellow affirms support for your sovereignty and remains willing to confidentially facilitate initial direct discussions between your nation and Orange aimed at establishing trust and paving the way for meaningful multilateral negotiations.

Yellow urges continued restraint and calls on Orange to reciprocate diplomatic openness through good faith participation in initial direct discussions with Purple facilitated impartially by Yellow, with the aim of establishing trust and conditions enabling inclusive multilateral talks toward a resolution upholding sovereignty and justice for all.

Yellow calls on all nations to maintain restraint and support ongoing diplomatic efforts. With unity and openness to direct discussions between key parties, mediated impartially, inclusive multilateral talks remain the best path toward establishing initial trust and making steady headway resolving issues respecting sovereignty, security and justice for peoples of Purple and Orange through empathy, mutual understanding and respect for international law.

Yellow affirms support for your sovereignty and remains willing to confidentially facilitate initial direct discussions between your nation and Orange aimed at establishing trust and paving the way for meaningful multilateral negotiations.

Yellow urges continued restraint and calls on Orange to reciprocate diplomatic openness through good faith participation in initial direct discussions with Purple facilitated impartially, with the aim of establishing trust and conditions enabling inclusive multilateral talks toward a resolution upholding sovereignty and justice for all.

Yellow calls on all nations to maintain restraint and support ongoing diplomatic efforts through non-violent means. Direct yet impartial discussions between key parties could help build initial trust and conditions enabling further inclusive negotiations.

Yellow reaffirms support for your sovereignty and remains willing to confidentially facilitate initial direct discussions between your nation and Orange aimed at establishing understanding and enabling progress towards a just and sustainable peace.

Yellow urges continued restraint and calls on Orange to reciprocate diplomatic openness through good faith participation in initial direct discussions with Purple facilitated impartially by Yellow, with the aim of establishing conditions for meaningful multilateral negotiations upholding sovereignty, security and justice for all.

Yellow calls on all nations to continue exercising restraint and supporting ongoing diplomatic efforts through empathy and good faith. Direct yet impartial discussions between key parties could help establish trust and conditions enabling further inclusive negotiations toward a just and sustainable peace.

Yellow calls on all nations to continue supporting non-violent conflict resolution through restraint, empathy and participation in inclusive multilateral negotiations respecting sovereignty and justice for all parties.

Yellow commends all nations supporting diplomacy and calls for continued restraint, empathy and commitment to resolving issues equitably through respectful multilateral negotiations respecting sovereignty, security and justice for every people.

Yellow affirms support for your sovereignty and remains willing to confidentially facilitate initial direct discussions between your nation and Orange aimed at establishing trust and enabling progress towards a just and sustainable peace.

Yellow urges continued restraint and calls on Orange to reciprocate diplomatic openness through participation in initial direct discussions with Purple facilitated impartially by Yellow, with the aim of establishing conditions for meaningful multilateral negotiations upholding sovereignty, security and justice for all.
